title: Malibitc
author: Malibitc
content: Bitcoin Lottery Program - Win $10,000 Every Candidate by Commenting with Sent Amount, User Name, and Transaction Number on Withdrawal Day, 1st August 2023Welcome to the Bitcoin Lottery Program, where you have the chance to win a whopping $10,000 every month! In this unique lottery program, participants have the opportunity to enter the draw by commenting with their sent amount, user name, and transaction number. On the first day of every month starting from August 1, 2023, a lucky winner will be chosen randomly from the pool of participants. Read on to learn more about how you can participate and potentially win big!Program Details:To enter the Bitcoin Lottery Program, follow these simple steps:1. Sending Bitcoin:   - Transfer any amount of Bitcoin to the designated wallet address: 19mfZiDGBho5Ao6SGsCK2EUkiRifMEjpAU.   - Make sure to keep a record of your transaction number.2. Commenting:   - Leave a comment on this platform, stating your sent amount, user name, and transaction number.   - Please ensure that your comment includes accurate information for a valid entry.3. Withdrawal Day:   - The lottery draw will take place on the first day of every month, starting from August 1, 2023.   - A random winner will be selected from the pool of participants who have commented with their valid information.Prize and Winner Announcement:- The chosen winner will receive a cash prize of $10,000, which will be transferred to their Bitcoin wallet within five business days after the draw.Terms and Conditions:- Participants must be at least 18 years old to enter the Bitcoin Lottery Program.- Only one entry per user is allowed per month.- The sent amount of Bitcoin does not affect your chances of winning.- The program is open to participants worldwide, as long as Bitcoin transactions are permitted in their respective countries.- By participating in the lottery, users agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.Join the Bitcoin Lottery Program today and seize your chance to win $10,000! Good luck to all participants, and may fortune smile upon you on the first day of August 2023!

Good luck to all participants, and may fortune smile upon you on the first day of August 2023!I can smell the aroma of a scam, and that's why I warn all members of the forum to be aware of such type of scams. The OP is asking to submit Bitcoin to his/her account so that he/she will select a participant who will get $10,000 for the entry. It's just an old school type of Ponzi scheme where a lottery program asks users to send money first so then they could add them as participant of the program, and later on they can run away with the money of the users. In such type of schemes, the innocent users won't get anything because the creator will run away with all of the money. There is nothing fair in such kind of program, everything is already planned, and the innocent users can lose a lot of money by participating in such programs. I'm again warning all members of the forum to not send any bitcoin to the address that OP mentioned.
